document_data.name: Mishad Patchwerk
document_data.mainbody: '''Mishad Patchwerk''' was the brother of [[Devlin Patchwerk]] and a fellow [[Shadow Thieves]] guild member who was stationed in [[Undermountain]], the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1370 DR]], The Shadow Thieves established an enclave in one of the top levels of the mega-dungeon underneath [[Waterdeep]]. Mishad Patchwerk and his brother were members of that guild branch led by the Guild Master [[Georges]] and his right hand, [[Braakus Sinjen]]. The word of the guild's return reached the [[Lords of Waterdeep]], and they sent a brave adventurer to discover the guild's hidden stronghold. Mishad was one of the first thieves to fall by the hero's weapons.
